description:
ZHIXIN CHAIN, a project completing main network launching and being applied commercially, is committed to establishing a complete workplace credit system, reducing corporate management costs, simplifying the recruitment process, and stimulating positive energy in the workplace.

The founding team has 20 years of human resource Internet service experience and 21.3 million Chinese enterprise resources, and the market expansion is progressing steadily. Currently, the v2 version of the main network has been put into operation, and the development of supporting facilities such as Dapp has been completed.

In the initial stage, the team donated 5 percent of the total ZXT to establish the global public welfare fund. Providing community members with lifelong free health care and other benefits, hope to build a sense of belonging community.
name: Zhixin Chain
